metadata.title: CVE-2016-5042 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.description:
The dwarf_get_aranges_list function in libdwarf before 20160923 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop and crash) viaa crafted DWARF section.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5042` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1').
